name: Personalized Wooden Baby Blocks-Raspberry Swirls Butterflies
description:
This Listing is for a 6 Letter Name & the 2 End Blocks Unique to your Nursery Decor.

These wooden blocks are hand painted and designed to uniquely match the nursery decor of your choice. The blocks are 2 inches in size. Paint used is non-toxic, but it is still recommended that these blocks are for decor use only, and not as a toy.

The picture of above is just an example of what I can do to coordinate with the "Raspberry Swirls Butterflies" nursery decor. I can design the set based on your preferences. Feel free to ask any questions or make suggestions regarding the design.

If you want to purchase a set of blocks and you have more or less letters in the baby's name please go to my store and select the listing with the correct number of letters. I charge $2 for each additional block. Similarly, I will deduct $2 for each block you don't need. Send me a message with the name after purchasing. It takes me 5-7 days to create your blocks and then I will quickly ship them to you. 

Each set of finished baby blocks are tightly wrapped in clear plastic cellophane wrap and coordinating ribbon is used to completely provide you with a fantastic product to keep for yourself & baby or to give as a gift. The baby blocks are then tightly packed and shipped to you. 


As I said before, these blocks are created just for you & I am willing to work with you to create exactly what you want. Please just send me a message with any questions or ideas that you may have. Just check out my store for other listings and ideas. Also, if I don't have your nursery decor in a listing, just email me a link or picture of the bedding and I will let you know what I can create for you.
